title: "Olive AI tried to raise money before shutting down"
excerpt: "Instead, Olive sold its remaining business lines to health IT company Waystar and AI startup Humata then closed its doors. It was a mighty fall for a company that two years earlier was valued at $4 billion and employed about 1,400 employees just last year."
